articles.title: Balogun out of Ecuador friendly, to join Super Eagles for AFCON qualifiers - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Leon Balogun has been ruled out of Super Eagles' friendly against La Tri of Ecuador on Thursday. Balogun was earlier expected to travel to New Jersey, United States of America after recovering from a minor calf injury that forced him to miss last Sunday's 2-2…
articles.content:

articles.author: Callie Patteson
articles.title: African American White House staffers leaving in mass 'Blaxit': report - New York Post
articles.description: Some of the departing staffers have left on good terms to pursue additional career or educational opportunities, others have attributed the turnover to a lack of mentorship and opportunity.
articles.content:
More than 20 black White House aides have departed the Biden administration since late last year, an exodus some have dubbed “Blaxit,” according to a new report.
While some of the departing staffers… [+5939 chars]
